column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Even though I visit this place about 2-5 times a year. Every time I find many new pieces that touch my heart and surprise how art can be made in many Â inspirational ways
column2: yet I visit those all time favorite pieces. For art history lovers
column3: Art institute has an amazing collection for impressionism especially when you like some famous artists like Van Gogh and Monet. If you like history in general
column4: they offer so much cultural objects from cultures around the world across many time frames.
